definition: (after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Skyscrapers are also lavish consumers, and wasters, of electirc power.
sentences.chinese: 摩天大樓還是電能的過度消費者與浪費者。

sentences.english: Skyscrapers are also lavish consumers, and wasters, of electric power.
sentences.chinese: 摩天大樓也是電力的奢侈消費者和浪費者。

sentences.english: Slowly the wasters and despoilers are impoverishing our land.
sentences.chinese: 浪費者和掠奪者們在慢慢地糟蹋着我們的土地。
